title: Description
content:
This snap-on fuzzy iPhone case is covered with premium hardwearing vegan Italian Alcantara. The colour is a very dark grey. The Fuzzy iPhone Cover snaps softly onto your iPhone 14. The RAISED BEZEL EDGE protects the screen when lying face down. In the bottom corner you'll notice a discreet logo. Inside is covered with the same alcantara. You'll never need to take it off, even when you’re CHARGING WIRELESSLY VIA MAGSAFE.



WHAT SETS IT APART


Made in Italy Alcantara - It's hardwearing, durable, VEGAN and easy to maintain but it's suede-like soft surface adds a real touch of luxury... and hey, if it's good enough for a Lamborghini car interior, it's guaranteed to be the right match for your iPhone case. The SPACES AROUND THE SPEAKER and charging port are left open for unrestricted access without compromising on protection

title: Worldwide Shipping
content:
Orders ship in 1-3 working days. This does not apply to products on pre-order with an estimated ship date.


UK- £7.99 - £9.99

EU - €14.99 - €24.99

USA - $19.99 - $29.99

Australia - AU$29.99

Rest of World - £24.99

title: Import duties & tax
content:
Orders shipping within the UK and EU include all applicable import fees and tax (wholesale orders excluded).


Orders to all other destinations do not include tax and may be subject to tax and duties on delivery. Tax rates are based on the rate of your country.

title: PO Boxes
content: We are unable to deliver to PO Boxes. Please enter a residential or commercial address when you place your order.

title: Returns
content: You have 14 days from the delivery date to request and dispatch a return. To send something back you can process the return automatically here: finecraft.returnscenter.com
